description: Compliance rules for legal contract analysis based on CUAD 41 categories

rules.name: Document Name Verification
rules.description: Verify the contract has a proper document name/title
rules.question: What is the name of the contract or agreement?

rules.name: Party Identification
rules.description: All parties must be clearly identified with full legal names
rules.question: Who are the parties to the contract? List all party names with their defined terms.

rules.name: Agreement Date Check
rules.description: Contract must have a clear agreement/signing date
rules.question: What is the date of the agreement or contract signing date?

rules.name: Effective Date Verification
rules.description: Contract should specify when it becomes effective
rules.question: What is the effective date when the contract comes into force?

rules.name: Expiration Date Check
rules.description: Contract should have clear expiration/end date terms
rules.question: What is the expiration date or end date of the contract term?

rules.name: Renewal Terms Review
rules.description: Check if automatic renewal clauses exist and their terms
rules.question: Does the contract contain automatic renewal terms? What are the renewal conditions?

rules.name: Governing Law Compliance
rules.description: Contract must specify governing law jurisdiction
rules.question: What is the governing law or jurisdiction that applies to this contract?

rules.name: Non-Compete Clause Analysis
rules.description: Identify any non-compete restrictions and their scope
rules.question: Does this contract contain non-compete clauses? What activities are restricted and for what duration?

rules.name: Exclusivity Provisions
rules.description: Check for exclusive dealing arrangements
rules.question: Does the contract grant exclusive rights to any party? What is the scope of exclusivity?

rules.name: Anti-Assignment Check
rules.description: Verify assignment restrictions and consent requirements
rules.question: Does the contract restrict assignment of rights? Is consent required for assignment?

rules.name: Termination for Convenience
rules.description: Check if parties can terminate without cause
rules.question: Can either party terminate this agreement for convenience (without cause)? What notice is required?

rules.name: IP Ownership Rights
rules.description: Identify intellectual property ownership and assignment terms
rules.question: Who owns the intellectual property created under this agreement? Are there any IP assignment provisions?

rules.name: License Grant Analysis
rules.description: Review license grants and their scope
rules.question: What licenses are granted in this contract? What is the scope, territory, and duration of each license?

rules.name: Confidentiality Obligations
rules.description: Verify confidentiality and NDA provisions
rules.question: Does the contract contain confidentiality or non-disclosure provisions? What information is protected?

rules.name: Liability Cap Review
rules.description: Check for liability limitations and caps
rules.question: Is there a cap on liability in this contract? What is the maximum liability amount or formula?

rules.name: Uncapped Liability Risk
rules.description: Identify any uncapped liability exposure
rules.question: Are there any obligations with uncapped liability? What types of breaches have unlimited liability?

rules.name: Indemnification Terms
rules.description: Review indemnification obligations
rules.question: What indemnification obligations exist? Who indemnifies whom and for what types of claims?

rules.name: Insurance Requirements
rules.description: Check insurance maintenance requirements
rules.question: Are there insurance requirements in this contract? What types and amounts of coverage are required?

rules.name: Audit Rights Review
rules.description: Verify audit and inspection rights
rules.question: Does any party have audit rights? What records can be audited and with what notice?

rules.name: Change of Control Provisions
rules.description: Check change of control triggers and consequences
rules.question: What happens upon a change of control of either party? Are there termination or consent rights?

rules.name: Most Favored Nation Check
rules.description: Identify MFN pricing or terms clauses
rules.question: Does the contract contain most favored nation or most favored customer provisions?

rules.name: ROFO/ROFR Analysis
rules.description: Check for right of first refusal/offer/negotiation
rules.question: Does the contract grant any right of first refusal, right of first offer, or right of first negotiation?

rules.name: Minimum Commitment Check
rules.description: Review minimum purchase or performance commitments
rules.question: Are there minimum purchase, volume, or performance commitments? What are the consequences of not meeting minimums?

rules.name: Volume Restriction Analysis
rules.description: Check for maximum volume or capacity limitations
rules.question: Are there volume restrictions or maximum quantity limitations in this contract?

rules.name: Price Restriction Review
rules.description: Identify price-related restrictions or controls
rules.question: Are there price restrictions, resale price maintenance, or pricing controls in this contract?

critical.description: Must be compliant - contract may be unenforceable or create significant risk

high.description: Should be compliant - may create business or legal risk
